Oct. 23, 2011 D Pogson Bray Entertainment Contest
Pogson Bray Entertainment Contest 5 Entertainments Contest Pogson Bray pogson-bray-entertainment-contest
Berties Bistro, Elland, West Yorkshire, England, UK Bands compete in a 20 minute concert programme which must include a march.
